name: pharaohs exe
description:
story of the game :
The story of the game goes back thousands of years. The age of the Pharaohs belongs to a person called Wasrex, who is half a human and half an alien. Through the stages of the game, he gets Red sun ray, which will help in creating enormous energy and power that helps in many areas ,some of the creatures try to prevent From obtaining them, battles between them take place inside Pharaonic temples. It is also possible through the game to get acquainted with the features of these temples. For who have not seen them before, I hope that you enjoy the game.
